getIComponentIdentifier

protected jadex.bridge.IComponentIdentifier getIComponentIdentifier(String type,
                                                                    long timeout,
                                                                    long periodBetweenRequests)
Get the agent's identifier of a certain type of agent.

Parameters:
type - the type of service the agent searched offers.
timeout - the maximum time it will be looking for the service. Zero or negative for infinite time.
periodBetweenRequests - the time it will wait between consecutive attempts.
Returns:
the identifiers of the first agent who offers the service.

getIComponentIdentifier

protected jadex.bridge.IComponentIdentifier getIComponentIdentifier(String type)
Get the agent's identifier of a certain type of agent.

Parameters:
type - the type of service the agent searched offers.
Returns:
the identifiers of the first agent who offers the service.

sendRequestAndGetResponse

protected Object sendRequestAndGetResponse(String request,
                                           jadex.bridge.IComponentIdentifier receiver,
                                           Long timeout)
                                    throws jadex.bdi.runtime.GoalFailureException
Active the Goal to initiate a request protocol communication. This goal will trigger a plan which will send a request and will wait for a response.

Parameters:
request - the Object to send
receiver - the agent's identifier of the receiver agent
timeout - the timeout in milliseconds we will wait for answer
Throws:
the - exception which will be send if timeout pass with no answer
jadex.bdi.runtime.GoalFailureException
